mapper.sql: id, areaCode, roleType, wechatPrice, webPrice, salePrice, goodsAddress, departmentCode, companyCode, parentCode, departmentPhone, departmentFax, departmentPrincipal, departmentName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_department ( areaCode, roleType, wechatPrice, webPrice, salePrice, goodsAddress, departmentCode, companyCode, parentCode, departmentPhone, departmentFax, departmentPrincipal, departmentName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{areaCode}, #{roleType}, #{wechatPrice}, #{webPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{goodsAddress}, #{departmentCode}, #{companyCode}, #{parentCode}, #{departmentPhone}, #{departmentFax}, #{departmentPrincipal}, #{departmentName}, #{status}, #{seqSort}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_department
areaCode = #{areaCode},
roleType = #{roleType},
wechatPrice = #{wechatPrice},
webPrice = #{webPrice},
salePrice = #{salePrice},
goodsAddress = #{goodsAddress},
departmentCode = #{departmentCode},
companyCode = #{companyCode},
parentCode = #{parentCode},
departmentPhone = #{departmentPhone},
departmentFax = #{departmentFax},
departmentPrincipal = #{departmentPrincipal},
departmentName = #{departmentName},
status = #{status},
seqSort = #{seqSort},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

areaCode = #{map.areaCode},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_department ( areaCode, roleType, wechatPrice, webPrice, salePrice, goodsAddress, departmentCode, companyCode, parentCode, departmentPhone, departmentFax, departmentPrincipal, departmentName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.areaCode}, #{map.roleType}, #{map.wechatPrice}, #{map.webPrice}, #{map.salePrice}, #{map.goodsAddress}, #{map.departmentCode}, #{map.companyCode}, #{map.parentCode}, #{map.departmentPhone}, #{map.departmentFax}, #{map.departmentPrincipal}, #{map.departmentName}, #{map.status}, #{map.seqSort}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_department
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND areaCode like CONCAT('%', #{areaCode} , '%')
AND roleType like CONCAT('%', #{roleType} , '%')
AND wechatPrice like CONCAT('%', #{wechatPrice} , '%')
AND webPrice like CONCAT('%', #{webPrice} , '%')
AND salePrice like CONCAT('%', #{salePrice} , '%')
AND goodsAddress like CONCAT('%', #{goodsAddress} , '%')
AND departmentCode like CONCAT('%', #{departmentCode} , '%')
AND companyCode like CONCAT('%', #{companyCode} , '%')
AND parentCode like CONCAT('%', #{parentCode} , '%')
AND departmentPhone like CONCAT('%', #{departmentPhone} , '%')
AND departmentFax like CONCAT('%', #{departmentFax} , '%')
AND departmentPrincipal like CONCAT('%', #{departmentPrincipal} , '%')
AND departmentName like CONCAT('%', #{departmentName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND seqSort like CONCAT('%', #{seqSort} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
